com.salimov.yurii.service.data.interfaces

Interface ArticleService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentService<Article,java.lang.Long>, DataService<Article,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArticleServiceImpl

    public interface ArticleService
extends ContentService<Article,java.lang.Long>
    The interface of the service layer, describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Article class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Article, ContentService, DataService

        Initializes, saves and returns a new article.
        Parameters:
        title - a title of the new article.
        description - a description of the new article.
        text - a text of the new article.
        keywords - a keywords of the new article.
        number - a number of the new article.
        category - a category of the new article.
        isValid - a value of validations of the model.

        The new saving article.

                      java.lang.String number,
                      Category category,
                      boolean isValid)
        Initializes, updates and returns article with parameter id.
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the article to update.
        title - a new title to the article.
        description - a new description to the article.
        text - a new text to the article.
        keywords - a new keywords to the article.
        number - a new number to the article.
        category - a new category to the article.
        isValid - a validated of the article.
        Returns:
        The updating article with parameter id or null.
        See Also:
        Article, Category, File
